title: TFR Ep. 578: WNUF Halloween Special, V/H/S/94, Halloween Streaming Picks
description:
On this special Halloween episode of The First Run, Chris and Matt discuss two Shudder exclusives.  First up it’s the possibly soon-to-be cult classic, the ‘WNUF Halloween Special’.  A film designed to look like a bootleg VHS copy of a local news Halloween Special that goes horribly wrong.  Then the V/H/S anthology series returns with 4 new stories with ‘V/H/S/94’. Can the series conquer the anthology film trap of being terribly uneven with this latest entry?  And finally as Halloween night is upon us, Matt and Chris share a horror movie pick for the streaming service of your choice.  Basically all of them.  So cuddle up, lock the doors, and settle in for a spooky Halloween special from your ghoulish friends at The First Run!

00:00-07:33: Intro/WNUF Halloween Special

07:34-19:19: V/H/S/94

19:20-32:52: Horror Streaming Picks

32:53-34:04: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

Twitter

Instagram

Facebook

On this special Halloween episode of The First Run, Chris and Matt discuss two Shudder exclusives.  First up it’s the possibly soon-to-be cult classic, the ‘WNUF Halloween Special’.  A film designed to look like a bootleg VHS copy of a local news Halloween Special that goes horribly wrong.  Then the V/H/S anthology series returns with 4 new stories with ‘V/H/S/94’.  Can the series conquer the anthology film trap of being terribly uneven with this latest entry?
